actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to authorize any officer or employee of the United States to accept the voluntary services of certain students for the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes any officer or employee of the United States to accept the voluntary services of secondary and college and university students for the United States.

titles.title: A bill to authorize any officer or employee of the United States to accept the voluntary services of certain students for the United States.
